about_the_game:
Step Back in Time with Brittany, the Rockabilly Dream Girl!

Experience the Thrill of Retro Romance with Brittany

Embark on a nostalgic romantic journey with Brittany, a retro-loving rockabilly fan with a passion for nightlife. This captivating content invites you to explore a world of vintage style and lively energy as you connect with this spirited character.

About Brittany:

  • Nostalgic Dates: Experience unforgettable dates filled with retro charm, from classic diners to lively rockabilly clubs.

  • Shared Passions: Discover Brittany's love for vintage fashion, rockabilly music, and the vibrant nightlife, and share your own passions with her.

  • Romantic Moments: Create lasting memories as you build a strong emotional connection with Brittany.

  • Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in beautifully environments and character designs that bring Brittany's world to life.

Perfect for Fans of:

  • Romantic visual novels

  • Dating simulators

  • Retro culture

  • Rockabilly music

Don't miss your chance to experience the thrill of Brittany's story. Purchase the DLC today and start your own rockin' romance!

Brittany is a retro-loving rockabilly fan with a passion for nightlife. Her vintage style and lively spirit light up any room.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains full nudity, front and back of several all characters

You can set up a scene and simulate sex with a 3D model.

The animations simulate sexual positions, and it is possible to move the camera freely around the scene, having a complete perspective of the sexual act.

There is nothing forced in the game.

All situations and characters were made just to simulate pleasure in a passionate and light way.

It is possible to see in detail the characters facial expressions and erogenous zones, including genitalias. 

You must be legal age of majority or over to play this game.
